title: 05/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to legendary Packers general manager Ron Wolf criticizing today’s superstar quarterbacks in the NFL and why he’s completely wrong. He argues in favor of LeBron James’ greatness and why his latest accomplishment is further proof of that. He also shares his top 5 players under the most pressure entering the NBA playoffs. Plus, former Cowboys LB Sean Lee joins the show to tell Colin when he knew QB Dak Prescott was special.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
